tasks.task: Prepare and use bicarbonato de sódio solution to control pests and fungi in plants.
subtasks: Gather materials (1 liter of water, 1 tablespoon of bicarbonato de sódio, neutral detergent, spray bottle).
Mix ingredients in the spray bottle and shake well until dissolved.
Apply solution to plants, including underside of leaves where pests may hide.
Repeat weekly if infested with pests like mealybug or scale.
Avoid applying during strong sunlight to prevent plant damage.
Use in the late afternoon when the sun is setting.

tasks.task: Control specific pests using bicarbonato de sódio.
subtasks: Combat colchineiras, spider mites, whitefly, ants, slugs, snails, and caterpillars.

tasks.task: Improve soil health with bicarbonato de sódio.
subtasks: Create an environment less favorable for pests.
Apply to compost heaps to neutralize bad smells.

tasks.task: Proper storage of bicarbonato de sódio solution.
subtasks: Use the prepared solution on the day of preparation.
Do not store the solution for more than 7 days as its effectiveness may degrade.
